messages.subject: Re:Re: Stepping in the hornet's nest
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/23/2001 11:18:09 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... And I ve had some pretty violent fantasies about John Ashcroft and a few others. [Non-text
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/23/2001 11:18:09 AM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> << Man won't be capable of choosing good on
> his own. He needs to be made to be good. (Just as many people are certain
> that children need to be made to learn because otherwise they'd indulge in
> pleasure all the time.) >>
>
> YES!
> Left to my own devices, I would probably steal and lie every day.
> Without the fear of hell, I would fool around on my husband.
> Without the hope of paradise, I would worship other gods all day if my mom
> would let me.
>
>
>
And I've had some pretty violent fantasies about John Ashcroft and a few
others.




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
